column2: because they were mentioned a lot in the Yelp highlights
column3: and I'm a sheep. The thing about being a Yelp sheep though
column4: is this: it almost always plays into your favor. You see
column5: I let a bunch of other people visit a place 5 or 6 times to determine what's the best. Then I swoop in once
column7: and walk away feeling like a regular in a town I don't live in.
